coreQueryPageProvider.name: SAVED_SEARCHES
coreQueryPageProvider.pattern: SELECT * FROM Document WHERE ecm:mixinType = 'SavedSearch' AND dc:creator = ? AND ecm:isProxy = 0 AND ecm:isCheckedInVersion = 0 AND ecm:currentLifeCycleState != 'deleted' AND SORTED_COLUMN IS NOT NULL

coreQueryPageProvider.name: SHARED_SAVED_SEARCHES
coreQueryPageProvider.pattern: SELECT * FROM Document WHERE ecm:mixinType = 'SavedSearch' AND dc:creator != ? AND ecm:isProxy = 0 AND ecm:isCheckedInVersion = 0 AND ecm:currentLifeCycleState != 'deleted' AND SORTED_COLUMN IS NOT NULL
